description: Try our easy to follow Reindeer Gingerbread Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Reindeer Gingerbread Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To decorate your reindeer, melt the milk chocolate block, according to packet instructions. Then spread on the top of each biscuit. Before it sets, place two white chocolate melts on top for the eyes, and place a milk chocolate chip upside down in the centre of the white melt, using the melted chocolate to help the choc chip stick. Then place a raspberry jelly underneath as the nose.
